attributes.action: Do not allow the return to the United Kingdom of ISIL fighters.
attributes.additional_details:
Do not under any circumstance allow the return to the UK of any individual who has gone to fight in Syria or Iraq for the group known as ISIL or for any other terrorist group in that region.

The arguement that they would be stateless is incorrect as these individuals have commited themselves to and are now citizens of ISil. Therefore they can remain in their caliphate indefinately.
